code:
%% C4 Context diagram: System-level view showing external actors and systems
%% This is the highest zoom level in the C4 model
%% Shows who uses the system and what external systems it depends on

C4Context
    title Internet Banking System - Context

    %% People who interact with the system
    Person(customer, "Banking Customer", "Views account balances and makes payments")
    Person(support, "Support Staff", "Handles customer queries")

    %% The system under design
    System(bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to manage accounts online")

    %% External systems the banking system depends on
    System_Ext(emailSystem, "Email System", "Sends transactional emails")
    System_Ext(coreBank, "Core Banking System", "Stores account and transaction data")

    %% Relationships between actors and systems
    Rel(customer, bankingSystem, "Uses", "HTTPS")
    Rel(support, bankingSystem, "Administers", "HTTPS")
    Rel(bankingSystem, emailSystem, "Sends emails via", "SMTP")
    Rel(bankingSystem, coreBank, "Reads/writes accounts", "REST API")
repo_description: Mermaid diagram management CLI — extract, render, inject
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
